It can be accessed by heading straight after Elphael's Prayer Room until reaching a wall, then dropping down to a flying buttress to the right, jumping to a platform with a pavillion, jumping to the flying buttress on the other side, walking up it, and going into the first doorway on the left. Replaces Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone.
